body.name: VITADE HD Webcam 1080P with Microphone & Cover Slide, 928A Pro USB Computer Web Camera Video Cam for Streaming Gaming Conferencing Mac Windows PC Laptop Desktop
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 21 hrs 5 mins
features: 【Hd Webcam 1080P】928A webcam with 80° wide angle lens captures high definition image and video at 1080p/30fps.
【Webcam with Cover for Privacy Protection】Built-in privacy shutter cover your webcam when not in use and prevent hackers from spying on you.

【Light Correction & Autofocus】Automatic low-light correction provide true-to-life video even in dim lighting conditions. With real time autofocus, 928A webcam quickly detects moving and capture object in a precise way, which saves you the trouble to adjust the focus manually. Note: The tripod placed under the blister box.

【Innovative Design】Unlike most webcam clips only rotating 90°, 928A webcam plate can rotates 360° freely.You can adjust the viewing angles as you like. Tripod-ready universal clip fits all computers, laptops, Mac, LCD or monitors.

【Plug & Play】Quick and easy setup in 1 minute. No drivers needed. Compatible with Windows 7 8 10, Mac OS 10.6 and above. Supports Chrome OS, Android 5.0 or higher. Works with social media and gaming.(Note: This webcam is not available for the PS4.)
body.description: Vitade 928A HD 1080P Webcam with Cover The Vitade 928A with tripod is one of the best webcams out there. Aimed at pro streamers, it features 1080P recording and live video calling with speedy autofocus. The face plate rotates 360 degrees, and the base clip can be mounted on a tripod with 180 degree foldable. Built in privacy cover prevent hackers from spying on you. Dual noise-cancelling mics deliver crystal clear audio, making it a great choice for business conferencing and presentations. Designed for quality video streaming & gaming on Youtube, Facebook, Skype and Hangouts, perfect for video chats, image, and video broadcast recording. Built-in privacy shutter cover your webcam when not in use and prevent hackers from spying on you. Compatible with Windows 7, Windows 10 or later, and most video calling applications Mac OS 10.6 or later，Android v5.0 or above, USB 2.0, plug and play. Register with Personify for VIP premium membership to enjoy video background change during live-broadcasting of the Xsplit game (Windows 7 and later).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Big improvement to the integrated laptop camera
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this camera for work as I work remotely from my home office. This is a big improvement from the small laptop video camera. The quality is significantly better, especially in lower light conditions. It mounts easily on my external monitor although be aware that the clamps are long enough for large curved monitors (I am using a 34” Curved LED). The camera can still perch on the monitor so it’s not really an issue. Installation was a breeze. It auto detects in Windows 10 and shows up as an external webcam. This works well with WebEx and Teams. The included physical privacy toggle is a nice feature. Overall I’m happy with the purchase and am enjoying a better web conference experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent and functional camera
reviews.reviewText: This HD auto-focus camera is fantastic. The image quality is excellent. The camera is easy to mount on its own mini-tripod, or any standard camera tripod. The cord is long, and it connects to the desktop or laptop with a standard USB connection. The driver is built-in, so the camera comes up as an option on your computer, along with any other built-in camera. This is a high-quality camera at a good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money.
reviews.reviewText: Good picture and sound for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with this webcam. There were many choices and I finally settled on this one. Considering that I am not very tech savvy, I was surprised that I could hook it up myself, just reading the directions. The quality seems quite good, especially for the money. The two folks I mainly Skype with commented favorably on the improvement in picture and sound (I was replacing that was about 20 years old, and while still working the picture and sound quality were not very good). This picture is very clear. The only thing I can't comment on is, of course, longevity. We'll have to see on that. The turn around time on the order was very short--two days and I am pretty rural.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2020
reviews.reviewText: In the past I've bought the name brand one that looks just like this but when I needed a new one at work I thought I would try a less expensive option. This camera has all the functionality and a better image. The mount is what really made me like it. It seems much easier to swivel around and get pointed exactly where I wanted it and it says in position. Came with one of the better desktop tripods I've seen also. Also a built-in lens cover, that's a must have privacy feature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Video Camera for Comupter
reviews.reviewText: Required a video camera and microphone for desk top computer to use with video conferencing while isolated at home. The picture quality is very good and the microphone works well. Like the movable shutter that allow me to cover the camera when not in use. Google attempts to connect to the camera on virtually every program I use. The shutter blocks the camera if I forget to reset the permissions setting in Google after a video conference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ridiculous little tripod!
reviews.reviewText: Jury's out on the camera... I will update once I try it, but the "tripod" that comes with it is about 3" high... ridiculous for what I need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the money
reviews.reviewText: I like my new little USB camera. It is a bit lightweight so I have to be careful to stabilize it so it doesn't fall over during my video class, but it's easy to focus on the area I need and swivels easily.

Got this cam for my son b-day and at the beginning, I was concern of the quality as it is not a reputable brand name as Logitech which I usually buy however I still order it due of the reviews.We installed it (simple plug and play) and I am very surprise of the quality of the image and sound. It was very clear and no lagging Also the auto focus works great.The only thing I was deceived a bit is they tell it has the option to add background features however to get it, you have to pay for it .Overall, its a great bang for your buck!Hopefully it will last for a long time.
Very good quality / price point - delivery was very timely.
i like it but its too like zoomed in to my face but overall love it
